oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cooperagreco: seus desafios e suas conquistas.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Costa Guzzatti, Thaise
Alécio Turnes , Valério
Bastezini, Daiana Andréia
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Farming Systems
Social aspects
Markets and trade
Values, standards and certification
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
Food systems
Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Case presents the story of the foundings and growth of Cooperagreco, a small-holder family cooperative in the state of Santa Catarina, Brazil.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Costa Guzzatti, Thaise; Alécio Turnes , Valério and Bastezini, Daiana Andréia (editor): Sociedade Nacional de Agricultura, SNA, Centro de Inteligência em Orgânicos (Eds.) (2012) Cooperagreco: seus desafios e suas conquistas. [Cooperagreco: challenges and achievements.] Estudo de caso. Sociedade Nacional de Agricultura, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
